message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer for your business, and I'm confident you'll see the value it brings. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,200,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $1,200,000 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $900,000?

I understand that $900,000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $1,100,000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice.  How about we settle at $1,000,000?

I'm not quite there yet, Bob. While $1,000,000 is a good price, I was thinking more along the lines of $1,050,000. This is a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic product, and I'm confident you'll see the value it brings. I'm willing to meet you at this price, but I don't think I can go any lower.
